refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GObject ╰── GInitiallyUnowned ╰── GstObject ╰── GstElement ╰── GstBaseSrc ╰── GstPushSrc ╰── GstDvbSrc

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: dvbsrc can be used to capture media from DVB cards. Supported DTV broadcasting standards include DVB-T/C/S, ATSC, ISDB-T and DTMB.

refsect3.title: Example launch line

informalexample.programlisting: gst-launch-1.0 dvbsrc modulation="QAM 64" trans-mode=8k bandwidth=8 frequency=514000000 code-rate-lp=AUTO code-rate-hp=2/3 guard=4 hierarchy=0 ! mpegtsdemux name=demux ! queue max-size-buffers=0 max-size-time=0 ! mpegvideoparse ! mpegvideoparse ! mpeg2dec ! xvimagesink demux. ! queue max-size-buffers=0 max-size-time=0 ! mpegaudioparse ! mpg123audiodec ! audioconvert ! pulsesink

refsect3.para: Captures a full transport stream from DVB card 0 that is a DVB-T card at tuned frequency 514000000 Hz with other parameters as seen in the pipeline and renders the first TV program on the transport stream.

informalexample.programlisting: gst-launch-1.0 dvbsrc modulation="QAM 64" trans-mode=8k bandwidth=8 frequency=514000000 code-rate-lp=AUTO code-rate-hp=2/3 guard=4 hierarchy=0 pids=100:256:257 ! mpegtsdemux name=demux ! queue max-size-buffers=0 max-size-time=0 ! mpegvideoparse ! mpeg2dec ! xvimagesink demux. ! queue max-size-buffers=0 max-size-time=0 ! mpegaudioparse ! mpg123audiodec ! audioconvert ! pulsesink

refsect3.para: Captures and renders a transport stream from DVB card 0 that is a DVB-T card for a program at tuned frequency 514000000 Hz with PMT PID 100 and elementary stream PIDs of 256, 257 with other parameters as seen in the pipeline.

informalexample.programlisting: gst-launch-1.0 dvbsrc polarity="h" frequency=11302000 symbol-rate=27500 diseqc-source=0 pids=50:102:103 ! mpegtsdemux name=demux ! queue max-size-buffers=0 max-size-time=0 ! mpegvideoparse ! mpeg2dec ! xvimagesink demux. ! queue max-size-buffers=0 max-size-time=0 ! mpegaudioparse ! mpg123audiodec ! audioconvert ! pulsesink

refsect3.para: Captures and renders a transport stream from DVB card 0 that is a DVB-S card for a program at tuned frequency 11302000 kHz, symbol rate of 27500 kBd (kilo bauds) with PMT PID of 50 and elementary stream PIDs of 102 and 103.

informalexample.programlisting: gst-launch-1.0 dvbsrc frequency=515142857 guard=16 trans-mode="8k" isdbt-layer-enabled=7 isdbt-partial-reception=1 isdbt-layera-fec="2/3" isdbt-layera-modulation="QPSK" isdbt-layera-segment-count=1 isdbt-layera-time-interleaving=4 isdbt-layerb-fec="3/4" isdbt-layerb-modulation="qam-64" isdbt-layerb-segment-count=12 isdbt-layerb-time-interleaving=2 isdbt-layerc-fec="1/2" isdbt-layerc-modulation="qam-64" isdbt-layerc-segment-count=0 isdbt-layerc-time-interleaving=0 delsys="isdb-t" ! tsdemux ! "video/x-h264" ! h264parse ! queue ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert ! queue ! autovideosink

refsect3.para: Captures and renders the video track of TV Paraíba HD (Globo affiliate) in Campina Grande, Brazil. This is an ISDB-T (Brazilian ISDB-Tb variant) broadcast.

informalexample.programlisting: gst-launch-1.0 dvbsrc frequency=503000000 delsys="atsc" modulation="8vsb" pids=48:49:52 ! decodebin name=dec dec. ! videoconvert ! autovideosink dec. ! audioconvert ! autoaudiosink

refsect3.para: Captures and renders KOFY-HD in San Jose, California. This is an ATSC broadcast, PMT ID 48, Audio/Video elementary stream PIDs 49 and 52 respectively.

refsect2.title: The “code-rate-hp” property
refsect2.para: (DVB-T, DVB-S/S2 and DVB-C) High priority code rate.

refsect2.title: The “pids” property
refsect2.para: Colon-separated list of PIDs (eg. 110:120) to capture. ACT and CAT are automatically included but PMT should be added explicitly. Special value 8192 gets full MPEG-TS.

refsect2.title: The “adapter” property
refsect2.para: The DVB adapter device number (eg. 0 for adapter0).

refsect2.title: The “diseqc-source” property
refsect2.para: (DVB-S/S2) Selected DiSEqC source. Only needed if you have a DiSEqC switch. Otherwise leave at -1 (disabled).

refsect2.title: The “frequency” property
refsect2.para: Center frequency to tune into. Measured in kHz for the satellite distribution standars and Hz for all the rest.

refsect2.title: The “frontend” property
refsect2.para: The frontend device number (eg. 0 for frontend0).

refsect2.title: The “symbol-rate” property
refsect2.para: (DVB-S/S2, DVB-C) Symbol rate in kBd (kilo bauds).

refsect2.title: The “stats-reporting-interval” property
refsect2.para: The number of reads before reporting frontend stats.

refsect2.title: The “timeout” property
refsect2.para: Post a message after timeout microseconds (0 = disabled).

refsect2.title: The “dvb-buffer-size” property
refsect2.para: The kernel buffer size used by the DVB api.

refsect2.title: The “stream-id” property
refsect2.para: (DVB-T2 and DVB-S2 max 255, ISDB max 65535) Stream ID (-1 = disabled).

refsect2.title: The “tuning-timeout” property
refsect2.para: Milliseconds to wait before giving up tuning/locking on a signal.

refsect2.title: The “lnb-lof1” property
refsect2.para: LNB's Local oscillator frequency used for low band reception (kHz).

refsect2.title: The “lnb-lof2” property
refsect2.para: LNB's Local oscillator frequency used for high band reception (kHz).

refsect2.title: The “lnb-slof” property
refsect2.para: LNB's Upper bound for low band reception (kHz).

refsect2.title: The “tuning-done” signal
refsect2.para: Signal emited when the tunner has successfully got a lock on a signal.

entry.para: the element on which the signal is emitted

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The “tuning-fail” signal
refsect2.para: Signal emited when the tunner failed to get a lock on the signal.

entry.para: the element on which the signal is emitted

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The “tuning-start” signal
refsect2.para: Signal emited when the element first attempts to tune the frontend tunner to a given frequency.

entry.para: the element on which the signal is emitted

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The “tune” signal
refsect2.para: Signal emited from the application to the element, instructing it to tune.

entry.para: the element on which the signal is emitted

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.
